archimate:BusinessActor.name: SCOPE
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
SCOPE is WFPâ€™s beneficiary and transfer management platform that supports the WFP programme intervention cycle from beginning to end. The SCOPE platform is a webbased application used for beneficiary registrations, intervention setups, distribution planning, transfers and distribution reporting.
more at: https://documents.wfp.org/stellent/groups/public/documents/communications/wfp272586.pdf
